title: 好无聊，想开一个服务器，大家说说什么样的服才能好玩点？
author: aixi_
txt_content: 如题，大家聊聊。各自都喜欢什么类型的？{:10_556:}

replies.author: 非人之物
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢mod生存和小游戏

replies.author: cafadong
replies.txt_content: 确实得调研  要不就是独裁

replies.author: 屎莱姆.
replies.txt_content:
多样点的
样式多而不杂是最好

replies.author: aixi_
replies.txt_content: 所以说，是mod重要，还是玩法重要？

replies.author: 神哥丿
replies.txt_content: 除了小游戏就是。。

replies.author: The11District
replies.txt_content: 原汁原味极限服

replies.author: Mr_Liuxing
replies.txt_content: 哦，自己去服务器版块看就知道了。

replies.author: 酱油路人乙
replies.txt_content: 安装女仆，萌妹子等等一切MOD的服最好
我喜欢空岛海岛神奇宝贝工业神秘。=·=

replies.author: Filum
replies.txt_content: 无插件生存 好玩>>

replies.author: lanmao521
replies.txt_content: 战争服，死亡掉落随便抄家

replies.author: Absolutefield
replies.txt_content: 生存偏向RPG！！！！好玩

replies.author: python_
replies.txt_content: 纯净生存

replies.author: zhanshen`
replies.txt_content: 服务器这种东西 各种各样 各有所爱 不同类型 根本没法说 qwq

replies.author: nsghd
replies.txt_content: 有剧情，有副本的RPG都不错的

replies.author: Hello99
replies.txt_content: 小游戏

replies.author: C-TD
replies.txt_content: 主要是看你做的用心不。

replies.author: lm946999625
replies.txt_content: 都重要啊，缺一不可

replies.author: aixi_
replies.txt_content:
C-TD 发表于 2016-9-2 12:25
主要是看你做的用心不。
已经开始准备了，准备期略长。因为要用心做。

replies.author: 吱哒
replies.txt_content: 建议楼主去服务器板块看看。

replies.author: RinAfter
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: qhysd
replies.txt_content: 原版生存
我也觉得剧情的不错~！

replies.author: UltraPanda
replies.txt_content: BungeeCord小游戏服
